    • Method Detail

      • fitPolygons

        public List<List<Point2D_I32>> fitPolygons(boolean external,
                                  double toleranceDist,
                                  double toleranceAngle)
        Fits a polygon to the specified contour.
        Parameters:
        external - true for the external contour or false for all the internal contours
        toleranceDist - Maximum distance away each point in the sequence can be from a line, in pixels. Try 2.
        toleranceAngle - Tolerance for fitting angles, in radians. Try 0.1
        Returns:
        List of polygons described by their vertexes
        See Also:
        ShapeFittingOps

      • fitEllipses

        public List<EllipseRotated_F64> fitEllipses(boolean external)
        Fits ellipse(s) to the specified contour
        Parameters:
        external - true for the external contour or false for all the internal contours
        Returns:
        List of found ellipses
        See Also:
        ShapeFittingOps
